content: meet the market day baby blanket - the second in my market day series created as a fun easily repeating pattern with a cute picot border perfect for the new kiddos in your life this pattern is great for new crocheters who have mastered the basic stitches and want to try something a bit larger finished measurements yarn superwash worsted weight yarn yardage approximately 1020 yards needles h/5mm techniques chain single double and half-double_crochet picot slip stitches
